description: Patterns are git repos, with working, deployable example code which solves a well described problem

sections.title: About this pattern
sections.instruction: Answer these questions as a comment, then check the boxes prior to proposal review.

checklist.comment: Why is the pattern is a good idea?
What is its advocacy potential?
Is the pattern free to run?
What is its priority?
Who will be writing the code?
Are we inheriting code?
Is it for a product or release launch?
Does this pattern fill a gap in our portfolio?
Does it overlap with our existing portfolio?
Can we partner up with a client?
Does this pattern highlight an IBM product advantage vs market product?

sections.title: Pattern content
sections.instruction: Commit this content prior to publication review.

checklist.comment: Architecture Diagram
Description - add in readme with the architecture diagram
Add in additional markdown files such as CONTRIBUTING.MD and MAINTAINERS.MD
Wiki / Journey Page
Blog

description: Blog posts are pearls of tech wisdom, published on the IBM Code Blog

checklist.comment: Title of the how-to you want to create
Brief description of the how-to steps
List of technologies you will be highlighting
What the how-to accomplishes
Why this is a good solution
Who is the target audience?
Which business unit you report to
